name: PowerPenalties
0:
”Alexa open power penalties”
”Alexa play power penalties”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: power penalties
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Mini Games.

You are the star striker and the world is your pitch! Prepare for the ultimate penalty challenge, where you'll face off against opponents like Lazy Larry and many more.

You'll be shooting goals not only on the field but in exotic locations like the zoo and even underwater!

Here's how to play:

1.Pick a direction for your shot (left, right, or middle).

2.Choose the height of your kick (up, down, or middle).

Unleash the power of your shot! Say "power" one to five times to find that perfect strength.

Can you beat the underwater level without getting your socks wet? Dive in to find out!

This skill is supported on all Alexa enabled devices, and has awesome visuals and animations for devices with screens, as well as immersive audio.

This skill is part of Mini Games.

If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Mini Games.

HUGO FM
